#summary DWScript Compiler Directives.

== Introduction ==

Directives provide means to control compiler behavior.

 * [ConditionalCompilation Conditional compilation] : $IFDEF, $IF, $ELSE, etc.
 * [InclusionDirectives Code Inclusions] : $I, $INCLUDE_ONCE, $FILTER, etc.
 * [MessageDirectives Errors and messages] : $HINT, $FATAL, etc.
